title: 机器人何时会迎来“ChatGPT时刻”？
description: 虽然通用人工智能仍然是最终目标，但工业化实施的道路可能类似于“一路生蛋”——逐渐积累数据、优化模型、降低成本，最终释放生产力和改善生活的潜力。
titleZh: 机器人何时会迎来“ChatGPT时刻”？
titleEn: When Will Robots Have Their "ChatGPT Moment"? Insights from Industry Experts on the Eve of Embodied Intelligence's Breakthrough
descriptionZh: 虽然通用人工智能仍然是最终目标，但工业化实施的道路可能类似于“一路生蛋”——逐渐积累数据、优化模型、降低成本，最终释放生产力和改善生活的潜力。
descriptionEn: While artificial general intelligence remains the ultimate goal, the path to industrial implementation may resemble "laying eggs along the way"—gradually accumulating data, optimizing models, and reducing costs to ultimately unlock productivity and life-enhancing potential.

title: ICML 2026最严新规：LLM不能列为作者，滥用AI导致直接拒稿
description: ICML 2026论文提交现已开放，截止日期为2026年1月28日。今年，关于AI的使用，组委会强调了三点：LLM不能“被视为作者”；
titleZh: ICML 2026最严新规：LLM不能列为作者，滥用AI导致直接拒稿
titleEn: ICML 2026's Strictest New Rule: LLMs Cannot Be Listed as Authors, AI Abuse Leads to Direct Rejection
descriptionZh: ICML 2026论文提交现已开放，截止日期为2026年1月28日。今年，关于AI的使用，组委会强调了三点：LLM不能“被视为作者”；
descriptionEn: ICML 2026 paper submissions are now open, with a deadline of January 28, 2026. This year, regarding AI usage, the organizing committee has emphasized three points: LLMs cannot be "credited as authors"; prompt injection is strictly prohibited and will result in rejection; and the use of AI in peer review is being expanded.

title: AI视频的下一步：不是编辑，而是模拟

descriptionZh: 本文将揭示Sora团队的核心思想：他们如何将视频模型从生成图像转变为理解统治世界的规律？
descriptionEn: This article will reveal the core thinking of the Sora team: how did they transition video models from generating images to understanding the laws that govern the world? How does this technical path push AI video towards the tipping point of Agent emergence?

title: 谷歌Gemini的失误：我的狗被AI剥夺了“犬类身份”
description: 您的智能扬声器可能已经比您更了解您自己了！
titleZh: 谷歌Gemini的失误：我的狗被AI剥夺了“犬类身份”
titleEn: Google Gemini's Blunder: My Dog Was Stripped of Its "Canine Status" by AI
descriptionZh: 您的智能扬声器可能已经比您更了解您自己了！
descriptionEn: Your smart speaker may already know you better than you know yourself! Google's newly launched Gemini for Home not only recognizes faces, packages, and visitors but also automatically generates "family daily reports." It can turn on lights, play music, close curtains, and even remind you when pets are active in the living room. However, this AI intern can be a bit "quirky"—it even mistakes dogs for cats. The pinnacle of intelligence might just be an adorable misunderstanding.
